snippet.title: Viva Project VR Demo v0.4 Teaser (DOWNLOAD LINK BELOW)
snippet.description:
Mouse and Keyboard supported! https://www.patreon.com/posts/30320982 The next installment in the free full release of my waifu game! Mouse and keyboard support available! Links to download are always provided free of charge at http://patreon.com/sgthale 

If you noticed some glitches in the video during gameplay, they will be addressed for launch day.
